column1: Little Goat Diner////We shared a whole bunch of things
column2: so rather than give you an exhaustive list
column3: I will juts note that 73% of them included pork
column4: and all of them made us make very adult noises. We all particularly liked the pork cheek
column5: which was a special that day. The PB&J pie (dessert)
column6: another item that could have easily been one-note
